scripts.push:dev: cp settings/.clasp.dev.json .clasp.json && clasp push; npm run clear:after
scripts.push:prod: cp settings/.clasp.prod.json .clasp.json && clasp push; npm run clear:after
scripts.pull:dev: npm run clear:src && cp settings/.clasp.dev.json .clasp.json && clasp pull; npm run clear:after
scripts.pull:prod: npm run clear:src && cp settings/.clasp.prod.json .clasp.json && clasp pull; npm run clear:after
